content: baby booties by mimi alelis © 2008 materials cannon cotton thread size 8 or substitute with cotton thread size 10 1 ball main color mc and half a ball of contrasting color cc will make 2 pairs 1 5mm or 1 75mm steel hook for crochet ties optional use 2mm hook 1 yard of ¼ ribbon optional size length of sole is about 3 ¾ using 1 5mm hook as shown in model this size is approximately for baby 0- 3 mos to increase size use bigger hook abbreviations slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = triple crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet st = stitch chain = chain gauge 8 sts and 4 double_crochet row = 1 instructions note chain 3 at the beginning of rnds counts as one double_crochet sole with main color start with chain 25 round 1 make 7 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in each of the next 20 chs 8 double_crochet in last chain then working on opposite side of chain double_crochet in each of the next 20 chain join with slip_stitch to top of turning chain 56 sts round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet on the next st 7 double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 14 double_crochet treble_crochet in each of next 5 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet in each of next 10 double_crochet this will be the front part of bootie treble_crochet in each of the next 5 double_crochet in each of the next 14 double_crochet join to the beginning of round 74 sts round 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in next 7 times double_crochet in next 20 sts 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet in the next st 2 double_crochet in next 9 times double_crochet in last 19 sts join 92 sts continue on to side section side section round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in back loop of each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to the beginning of this round 92 sts round 5 chain 3 working in both loops double_crochet in each double_crochet around join 92 sts round 6-7 repeat round 5 cut off thread 92 sts instep with contrasting color thread chain 5 join with slip_stitch to form ring round 1 chain 3 make 11 double_crochet in ring join round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join round 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet except on the last 10 make 3 treble_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet in last double_crochet join round 4 chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 14 times 3 half_double_crochet on next treble_crochet using stitch marker or scrap of yarn mark the middle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet on next single_crochet on 8 sts half_double_crochet on next 3 half_double_crochet on next mark the middle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet on last st join and fasten off joining
